Generation V.Black: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
Generation V.White: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each retains memories of its former life.
Generation V.Black 2: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
Generation V.White 2: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.

Generation VI.X: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
Generation VI.Y: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

Generation VIII.Sword: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's said that this Pokémon was formed when an ancient clay tablet was drawn to a vengeful spirit.

Generation VIII.Sword: Trade Galarian Yamask at Ballonlea Stadium ( Unovan Form ) Route 6 ( Galarian Form ) Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness Sh , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle ) ( Galarian Form )
Generation VIII.Shield: Trade Galarian Yamask at Ballonlea Stadium ( Unovan Form ) Route 6 ( Galarian Form ) Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness Sh , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle ) ( Galarian Form )
